import React ,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import './Shop.css'; import ShopDisplay from './ShopDisplay'; const base_url ="https://nykaa-api-jfl3.onrender.com" const Shop =()=>{ const [indianwear,setIndianwear] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`${base_url}/indianwear`, {method:'GET'}) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data)=>{ setIndianwear(data) }) },[]) // console.log(indianwear); return( <>

Best in Beauty

{/* */}

Haircare

) } export default Shop;
